insert into cs_changes (process_user_id, process_user_name, terminal_id, status, receive_address_id, created_at, updated_at, reason, customer_id, should_cancel, cs_cencel_id, apply_num, return_address_id, templete_info_xml) values (#{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{receiveAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{shouldCancel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{csCencelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{returnAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templeteInfoXml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update cs_changes set process_user_id = #{processUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, process_user_name = #{processUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminal_id = #{terminalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=TINYINT}, receive_address_id = #{receiveAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, updated_at = #{updatedAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, reason = #{reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, customer_id = #{customerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, should_cancel = #{shouldCancel,jdbcType=BIT}, cs_cencel_id = #{csCencelId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, apply_num = #{applyNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, return_address_id = #{returnAddressId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, templete_info_xml = #{templeteInfoXml,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, process_user_id, process_user_name, terminal_id, status, receive_address_id, created_at, updated_at, reason, customer_id, should_cancel, cs_cencel_id, apply_num, return_address_id, templete_info_xml from cs_changes where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
